column4: hrm, I feel like there is some sort of security implications with your root password being your password
it's not the same, root password by default is randomly generated each install of ubuntu
well you need to be able to use root somehow, lol
it's so your account is sort-of-root.  so you can use root powers when you need it but for the most part they're disabled.  Yea I know what you mean I was waiting for the root password question too.
